title: Drawing, "Jascha Heifetz Apartment: Game Room", 1935
medium: Graphite and red color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Office stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/ NEW YORK CITY
description: Wrap-around five-piece sofa in upper right corner, fireplace on upper wall to left, fronted by retangular table, chair to right of fireplace. Curved bar in upper right corner, shelves behind bar. Doorway on lower right wall. Radiator and window on lower wall to right, doorway to left. Table and four chairs in lower left corner, descending staircase to left. Window on lower left wall. Geometric floor designs in red. Indication of room partition between game room and bar.
